text: Speed (launched in 1995) was an American sports-oriented cable and satellite television network. It was owned by the Fox Sports Media Group division of 21st Century Fox. It ceased operations on August 17, 2013. The network aired motorsports programming, including auto racing, as well as automotive-focused programs. Category:American television channels Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States
title: Speed (TV network)
